channel.title: Pi 317
channel.description: server doesnt stay up losses connection i even have vps everything was set properly. what could it be thats cause it to disconnect and wont come up or it will sometimes just kick everyone off an then they can logg on but sometimes they just cant an i have to shut the server off and reopen the cmd to the server.???

item.title: Pi 317
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

l skinner l:

well is there anyway of fixing it? like deleting something to make it run smoother? cause it has dungeeneering an its messed up all the way around. i dont care to deleting it.

If you want to rewrite it, go ahead. You have the source, you have the choice to change whatever you want. There is no “easy” way to improve your server performance. It’s like building a castle out of wet sand. Sure, it might be fine for a while, but it’s built on a very unstable foundation, and will eventually crumble.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi 317
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

l skinner l:

its an insidiax v2 source and client?

That means nothing. No matter what type of source it is, if it’s poorly programmed, it will behave in a similar manner.
